column4: Hey folks, I'm in ubuntu 11.04 and looking to find a decent windows emulator that runs well on a slower machine
however i don't want something like, vmware or virtualbox that creates a whole thing, and the main program I want to run crashes in wine all the time
i've been looking a while now and haven't come across anything that really impressed me
i'm just saying i don't want a whole virtual desktop because this computer is fairly old and slow and i have enough performance issues as it is
yeah i'm looking for something similar to wine that's light and doesn't require allocating ram and resources like a virtual machine does
virtualization with qemu or Virtualbox is possible but with old hardware wine is the solution .
if wine is not working then no luck... YOu have to wait for your app supprot in wine
